pages.text:
&n&6&lDimension:&r&r    &n&lEverdawn&r
&n&6&lArea Level:&r&r    &n35 - 55 &r&r
&n&6&lEnraged Area Level:&r &n65 - 85&r
&n&6&lExceptions:&r  &nNone&r
&n&6&lQuests covered:&r  &nAct IV;&r
&n&6&lDimension gateways:&r  &nAct IV Gateway;
&n&6&lDimension Bosses:&r &nAlchemist, Arachnarch  &r

$(br) It looks like this dimension has a constant sunrise but its always hot and humid here.$(br) This dimension is home to lots of insects that thrive in the humidity.$(br) You can see more insects here especially during the rain but thankfully it only slightly drizzles. Insects here grew much bigger in size, some are even as big as I am.$(br) You might get much more information if you read the Blue Journal you got from a Gatekeeper.

pages.title: Getting into the Everdawn
pages.text:
If you are looking to get to this dimension you need to lay your hands on&n&l at least 10 Lunar Stone Bricks and a Zeal Lighter obtained from a Gatekeeper &r.
  &oCorner blocks are completely optional but they would grant &2+5 to Aestetics&r stat if it exsisted

pages.name: Everdawn Portal
pages.text: Click on eye icon to visualize portal in game
